title: Wizened Cenn

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (White) each night.
- (1) Attack a player each night.
- (White)(White): Increase the Attack and Defense of all other Gatherers for tonight, to a maximum of Unstoppable/Invincible, respectively.

desc:
Post 1906
*“Thoughtweft binds us together as one, part of an intricate pattern that would unravel if even one thread came loose.”*
